thread.title: Rutgers injury report: Safety Anthony Cioffi questionable for Michigan State game
thread.title_full: Rutgers injury report: Safety Anthony Cioffi questionable for Michigan State game | NJ.com

author: Dan Duggan | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Rutgers injury report: Safety Anthony Cioffi questionable for Michigan State game
text:
PISCATAWAY â€” The hits just keep on coming for the Rutgers secondary. For the second consecutive game week, a starting safety has been added to the injury report in the lead up to kickoff.
Starting free safety Anthony Cioffi is listed as questionable with an upper body injury for Saturday's game against Michigan State (8 p.m., BTN). Cioffi has been Rutgers' best defensive player this season, leading the team with two interceptions and ranking fourth with 18 tackles.
Before Rutgers played Kansas on Sept. 26, starting strong safety Davon Jacobs was added to the injury report with an upper body injury. Jacobs missed that game and he is listed as questionable against Michigan State.
Redshirt freshman Kiy Hester took Jacobs' spot in the starting lineup against Kansas. Hester, who had nine tackles and two pass break-ups in a 27-14 win over Kansas , is in line to start again.
If Cioffi is sidelined, redshirt freshman Saquan Hampton would likely move into the starting free safety spot. Versatile backup Andre Hunt would also be in line for an expanded role at both safety spots and in sub packages.
RELATED: Wide receiver John Tsimis ruled out for Michigan State game
No. 3 cornerback Jarius Adams is also questionable with an upper body injury. Rutgers currently has six scholarship defensive backs not on the injury report. The secondary depth already had been stretched thin after four experienced defensive backs were kicked off the team before the season opener .
On the positive side, right guard Chris Muller and defensive ends Djwany Mera and Kemoko Turay have been removed from the injury report. Those players had been listed as probable on Monday's injury report .
Here is the full injury report:
OL Zack Heeman (Lower body): Probable
CB Ronnie James (Lower body): Probable
CB Jarius Adams (Upper body): Questionable
FS Anthony Cioffi (Upper body): Questionable
SS Davon Jacobs (Upper body): Questionable
TE George Behr (Lower body): Out
WR Dontae Owens (Lower body): Out
RB Desmon Peoples (Upper body): Out
LB Nick Rafferty (Upper body): Out
LB Austin Rosa (Lower body): Out
DB Charles Snorweah (Upper body): Out
WR John Tsimis (Lower body): Out
DT Darius Hamilton (Lower body): Out for season
LB T.J. Taylor (Knee): Out for season
